biotools.summary: Simplifying the generation of insight from protein structures through structure visualisation, annotated with protein features; loads sequence-to-structure alignments from the PSSH2 database, sequence features from UniProt and Interpro and user defined features on demand from JSON files; there is also a WebAPI (see ...).
